body_html: The benefit of merging now is that code will start using the new API, which will help reduce merge conflicts later. So, merging this is a value proposition for me (who has less merge conflicts to fix later) and for the code reviewers (who don't have to wade through a lot of trivial changes to see the substantive changes.)

body: The benefit of merging now is that code will start using the new API, which will help reduce merge conflicts later. So, merging this is a value proposition for me (who has less merge conflicts to fix later) and for the code reviewers (who don't have to wade through a lot of trivial changes to see the substantive changes.)
